summary: This document contains a series of bank statements for the account of GREAT ST JIM, LLC, detailing transactions from September 30, 2016, to February 28, 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and balance information, indicating financial activity related to the account. This document contains a series of bank statements for the account of Great St Jim, LLC, detailing transactions from March 31, 2017, to April 30, 2018. The statements include information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and daily balances, indicating the financial activity of the account over the specified period. This document contains bank statements for Great St Jim, LLC, detailing account transactions, including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges. It provides a snapshot of the financial activity for the account over specific periods, highlighting the beginning and ending balances. This document contains a series of bank statements from First Bank for the account associated with Great St Jim LLC. The statements detail transactions, including deposits, service charges, and account balances over several months in 2018. Notably, there are significant deposits and service charges recorded, indicating financial activity related to the entity. This document contains bank statements for the account of 'Great St Jim LLC' from November 2018 to February 2019, detailing transactions including deposits, service charges, and check images. It highlights significant financial activities, including a large incoming wire transfer and various service charges. This document contains a series of bank statements for Great St. Jim, LLC, detailing account transactions, including deposits, service charges, and balance information from March 2019 to January 2020. It highlights the financial activities of the LLC, including incoming wires and service fees.
